Key Match Events: Bryce Harper hit a home run in the 2nd inning to tie the game at 2-2
Aaron Bohm hit a home run in the 3rd inning to give the Phillies a 3-2 lead
J.T. Realmuto singled in the 7th inning to score Bohm and extend the Phillies' lead to 4-3
Brandon Nimmo tripled in the 7th inning to score two runs and give the Mets a 5-4 lead, but the Phillies scored three runs in the bottom of the 7th to take a 7-5 lead
Post-Match Reflections: Zack Wheeler earned the win for the Phillies, improving his record to 13-6
Jeff Quintana took the loss for the Mets, dropping his record to 3-7
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Phillies have now won four straight games against the Mets
Others: The game took 2 hours and 31 minutes to complete
